headline: Floods cause chaos across Europe  in pictures
text: Highways and fields are completely flooded near the eastern Bavarian city of Deggendorf  Photograph: Wolfgang Rattay/Reuters       Residents clean up debris in Grimma, Germany Photograph: Action Press/Rex Features       This part of Saxony in Germany looks more like Venice Photograph: Action Press/Rex Features       Rescuers help a resident escape from a house surrounded by water in Deggendorf Photograph: Karl-Josef Hildenbrand/dpa/Corbis       Firefighters are central to the defence efforts Photograph: Sean Gallup/Getty Images       Their hoses are being used to send the rising groundwater back out into the Elbe river Photograph: Sean Gallup/Getty Images       An army truck drives through water by the Elbe near Strehla, Germany Photograph: Matthias Hiekel/dpa/Corbis       The Czech Republic has also been hit by disastrous floods. Here in Cesky Krumlov, water cascades around properties Photograph: Profimedia/Barcroft Media       In the town of Meissen, the water is so deep even the road signs are submerged Photograph: Ruben Neugebauer/Demotix/Corbis       The maximum water level will be reached on Friday morning, forecasters predict Photograph: Ruben Neugebauer/Demotix/Corbis       A local makes preparations for the flood in Radebeul near Dresden Photograph: Ruben Neugebauer/Demotix/Corbis       Volunteers confer as they stack sandbags in the central German town of Calbe Photograph: Odd Andersen/AFP/Getty Images       For some, like these residents in Hrensko in the Czech Republic, paddling out is the only option Photograph: David W Cerny/REUTERS
